name: Assassin's Creed III: Battle Hardened Pack
name_original: Assassin's Creed III: Battle Hardened Pack
description:
Assassin's Creed III: Battle Hardened Pack is an action game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. It came out on 09-01-2013. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Assassin's Creed III: Battle Hardened Pack on PC and PlayStation 3.
